data.name: Tony Roma's - Dubai
data.description: For over 40 years, connoisseurs of fine food have found our cuisine simply irresistible. It all started in 1972 and today we have over 150 locations from Miami to Dubai. Tony Roma's taste sensation has taken the world by storm. Feel at home as you step into our casual restaurants with their laid-back ambience. Flip through the menu and take your pick - tasty appetisers, fresh salads, chicken and seafood entrées, signature steaks, great burgers and sandwiches, delicious desserts and much more.

data.delivery_minimum_amount_message:
A delivery fee of AED 6 will be added to orders less than AED 45 
 
 Please add 45 to your order for free delivery or continue with AED 6 delivery fee.

products.name: Tony Roma's Sampler
products.description: Create your own flavor adventure. In addition to our signature onion loaf, choose any three (3) appetizers

products.name: Kickin Shrimp
products.description: Tempt your taste buds with tender shrimp fried to a crisp golden brown and tossed in a creamy sauce exploding with flavour

products.name: TR Mushrooms
products.description: Succulent fried mushrooms with a little kick. Served with honey mustard dressing for dipping

products.name: TR Mussels
products.description: Braised mussels, garlic butter. Served with grilled french bread

products.name: Chicken Quesadilla
products.description: Grilled chicken, melted Italian cheese, and freshly-made pico de gallo tucked inside flour tortillas

products.name: Potato Croquettes
products.description: Served with lemon truffle aioli and balsamic ketchup

products.name: Onion Loaf
products.description: Giant hand-cut onions, breaded, deep-fried and served with our spicy BBQ dipping sauce

products.name: Sweet Potato Fries
products.description: Served with your choice of dip, garlic ranch, BBQ delight or honey mustard

products.name: Vegetable Bruschetta
products.description: Freshly diced Roma tomatoes blended with basil, cheese, garlic, and tomato pesto

products.name: Boneless Buffalo Bites
products.description: Tender chicken breast lightly breaded and tossed in hot buffalo sauce, served with ranch dressing.

products.name: Calamari
products.description: Tender rings of calamari coated in a crunchy breading, deep-fried and served with garlic aioli sauce

products.name: Spinach Artichoke Dip

products.name: Avocado Fries

products.name: Grilled Chicken Burger
products.description: A juicy grilled chicken breast topped with lettuce, tomato, red onion rings and spicy sauce, served with French fries

products.name: Primetime Burger
products.description: Topped with caramelized onions, creamy cheese and our very own TR special sauce

products.name: Grilled Portobello Burger
products.description: Grilled portobello mushrooms, roasted red bell peppers, caramelized onions, tomatoes romaine lettuce, melted Swiss cheese and our special sun-dried pesto sauce, served with french fries

products.name: Steakhouse Burger

products.name: Memphis Burger
products.description: pure-beef burger loaded with cheddar, red onion, pickles, topped with shredded beef rib and black sauce

products.name: Roma Burger
products.description: A real classic. Cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion and pickles

products.name: Cheese Burger Bites

products.name: Fire Grilled Chicken Wrap
products.description: A fire grilled chicken breast topped with Italian cheese, lettuce, fresh diced tomatoes and our special garlic ranch, served with French fries

products.name: Roast Beef Grilled Sandwich

products.name: Fillet Meddalions 300g

products.name: Miami Steak & Fries 200g
products.description: Tender and flavorful petite filet topped with peppercorn sauce and served with French fries

products.name: Fillet Mignon 230g

products.name: Veal Escalope
products.description: Pan-fried breaded tender veal. Served with French fries and green salad.

products.name: BBQ Caramelized Onion Steak 200g
products.description: Tender steak topped with BBQ caramelized onion served on a bed of mashed potatoes. 200g

products.name: Ribeye 315g
products.description: Natural marbling makes this a rich, flavorful steak

products.name: Red Pepper Steak 200g
products.description: A well-marinated rump steak topped with spicy fire roasted red pepper sauce

products.name: New York Strip 315g

products.name: Bountiful Beef Ribs

products.name: Bountiful Beef Ribs & Fillet Medallions

products.description: Linguine sauteed with portobello mushrooms roasted red bell peppers, diced eggplant tossed with tomato pesto sauce and topped with creamy feta cheese

products.name: Salmon Carbonara Fettuccine
products.description: Juicy salmon perfectly seasoned in a rich creamy sauce and tossed with fettuccine

products.name: Shrimp Scampi Pasta

products.name: Honey Lime Shrimp Salad

products.name: Mojo Chicken
products.description: Three filet medallions with your choice of up to three gourmet toppings. Served with loaded mashed potatoes

products.name: Red Pepper Chicken
products.description: Two seasoned chicken breasts, grilled and topped with spicy fire roasted red pepper sauce. Served with loaded mashed potatoes and mixed vegetables

products.name: Grilled Chicken Spinach Stack
products.description: Two stacked grilled chicken breasts, covered with a rich blend of cheeses, artichoke hearts, creamy spinach and bread crumb topping. Served with rice and mixed vegetables

products.name: BBQ 1/2 Chicken
products.description: Two stacked grilled chicken breasts, covered with a rich blend of cheeses, artichoke hearts, creamy spinach and bread crumb topping. Served with rice and mixed vegetables

products.name: Fish And Chips
products.description: Hand-battered fish fillets fried to a golden brown. Served with French fries, coleslaw and tartar sauce.

products.name: Seafood Platter
products.description: Large combo of our fried seafood favorites, including hand-battered fish ﬁllet, South Miami fried shrimp and tender calamari. Served with French fries and tartar sauce

products.name: Grilled Salmon
products.description: Succulent grilled salmon fillet served with your choice of two sides

products.name: Chocolate Brownie Sundae
products.description: A warm, chewy fudge brownie topped off with vanilla ice cream, hot fudge, whipped cream. You can also have it drizzled with strawberry syrup, the choice is yours.

products.name: Apple Crisp A la Mode
products.description: A delicious blend of apples, cinnamon and sugar, baked to golden perfection with a crumb topping. Topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and caramel topping
